hero.title: hi, I'm PauloJr
hero.subtitle: Developer
hero.description: I'm a frontend developer with experience in React, Typescript, Tailwindcss and Nodejs.

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a student of Information Technology Management focused on the strategic role of IT in business. I specialize in Front-End Development and UX Design, creating responsive and intuitive interfaces. I work with tools like React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Figma to build clean, scalable solutions. I'm looking for opportunities to apply my skills in real projects that connect user needs to business goals.
